Package it.unipr.ingegneria.entities

Class Warehouse

java.lang.Object
it.unipr.ingegneria.entities.Warehouse
All Implemented Interfaces:
IObservable<WineShop>, IWarehouseManager<Wine>
public class Warehouse
extends java.lang.Object
implements IWarehouseManager<Wine>, IObservable<WineShop>
The Warehouse is a class used to manage the stocks of the wine.
Author:
Ruslan Vasyunin, Francesca Rossi, Everton Ejike

    • remove

      public java.util.List<Wine> remove​(java.util.Map<Params,​java.lang.Object> elements) throws RequiredValueException, AvailabilityException
      Remove the wine and return the Wines if the number is less or equal to the required quantity
      Parameters:
      elements - Map that contains info about Wine as name and quantity
      Returns:
      List of Wine
      Throws:
      RequiredValueException - Exception launched when params are not valid
      AvailabilityException - Exception launched when Wine is not available
